title: AcidChemicals1 SoundEffect
description: This is an AcidChemicals sound effects package that can be used to depict chemical reactions involving acidic solutions, lab chemicals, and the corrosive effects of substances like zombie or monster saliva (secretions) or blood.
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/b34cEhH6aUk


This AcidChemicals sound effects package can be used to depict chemical reactions involving acidic solutions, lab chemicals, and the corrosive effects of substances like zombie or monster saliva (secretions) or blood.

  • 231 Audio, 231 Cue


Files.

  • AcidBurn 20
  • AcidFoam 10
  • AcidHiss 81
  • AcidHiss_Loop
  • AcidWater_Dissolve 31
  • AcidWater_Dissolve_Loop 9
  • MudSqueeze 21
  • SodiumChloride 10
  • SodiumChloride_Shot 40
